archimate:Requirement.name: RACI-matrix shows expectations on customers in relation to the Security Baseline
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
In the meeting 29/5 Agree expectations on customer specific material, Mattias Dahlberg proposed to the CISO that the easiest way to show the expectations on the customers, would be using a RACI-matrix. The CISO Lingskog agreed. C and I can be excluded, as Lingskog thought it would get too complicated.
Mattias had a chat with Owen after the meeting with Lingskog, where Owen pointed out the difficulties with doing a RACI-matrix for this and the risk for misunderstandings amongst those who read it. Mattias invited Lingskog to a meeting 2/6, but Lingskog declined it 30/5 with the reply "We need to first not to have these dedicated materials in awareness program cause that will grove the whole program cause it requires the needs to be able to answer RFPs etc".
Lingskog wrote 31/5 the following in a mail to Veronika Segarova, Mattias Dahlberg and Owen Richardson: · 1.2.9 – 1.2.11Create SB v3 customer expectations material. Security baseline is NOT for customers. Yes they will benefit from it but it is for internal minimum level of security
